snippet: HOROWYTZ--Harold. It is with profound sadness and deep affection that Zabar's announces the passing of Harold Horowytz, Zabar's Deli Director, on May 15, 2016. Born in 1928, Harold was one of the last of the old-school deli men. A deep affection and special bond was shared between Harold and anyone who had a chance to work with him. Harold's reach went beyond the deli counter at Zabar's. His advice was sought after and he was respected as a confidant and a beloved figure throughout the store. Although Harold retired in 1992, each holiday season he would return to supervise the department. Harold was truly larger than life and will be missed by all. 1/3
